version_name: 2.1.1+ Fixed running on iOS 8. Sorry!Version 2.1+ Manage your skills - make your training plan even more individualized!+ Integrated warmup & stretching - unleash your full potential!+ Coach design update - more infos

version_description:
We made some layout improvements. Your app will shine again!

Found a bug? Let us know. We'll fix it in less time than your last Aphrodite PB.

Keep pushing,
Your Freeletics Team

Athletes,
You put your heart, sweat and willpower into every nasty Aphrodite, Helios, or even just 50 sit-ups that your Coach gives you every week. For that we wanna say #ClapClap. Thank you for continuously grinding and pushing your limits. We would give every single one of you a 5-star rating if we could.
For this, we owe you the same commitment. The same dedication. So that's exactly what we’re doing. Day in, day out, we give our all to improve your training experience and make it unforgettable. We fix bugs, improve the App's performance and features, and work hard on very exciting things that we can’t wait to show you!
So stay tuned, and in the meantime, keep giving it your all! No Excuses!
#ClapClap
The Freeletics Team.

Athletes,
You put your heart, sweat and willpower into every nasty Aphrodite, Helios, or even just 50 sit-ups that your Coach gives you every week. For that we wanna say #ClapClap. Thank you for continuously grinding and pushing your limits. We would give every single one of you a 5-star rating if we could.
For this, we owe you the same commitment. The same dedication. So that's exactly what we’re doing. Day in, day out, we give our all to improve your training experience and make it unforgettable. We fix bugs, improve the App's performance and features, and work hard on very exciting things that we can’t wait to show you!
So stay tuned, and in the meantime, keep giving it your all! No Excuses!
#ClapClap
The Freeletics Team.

NEW: Always train in top form. You can now watch exercise animations during your training. Great for keeping perfect technique.

We also made some changes to keep your app at its personal best.

If you find a bug, let us know! We'll squash it faster than you can do a burpee.

We squashed several bugs. But if you find any more, let us know! We'll get to them faster than you can get to your nearest training spot.

We made a ton of changes to prepare for new features coming soon. Stay tuned.

NEW: Find workouts and exercises more easily in the improved training tab.

IMPROVED: Your feed has a new, more modern look. Easier than ever to give ClapClaps and watch other Athletes' progress.

We've made changes under the hood. Because for apps, like Athletes, outward changes start as invisible changes within.

As always, we've blasted some bugs. If you find more, let us know! We'll set a new PB in fixing them.

NEW: Train offline, even in the most remote parts of the world. Your app will save your training, then upload it when you get internet again.

NEW: Always train in top form. Now you can follow exercise animations during your workout for some exercises. Now there's no excuse not to earn a star.

As always, we've made big changes under the hood. Expect to start seeing exciting new features soon!

If you see a bug, let us know! Our engineers love squashing them.

IMPROVED: New pre-training screen with videos helps you prepare for your session and train more effectively.

We've made improvements under the hood. Because change starts from within.

If you see any bugs, let us know! We will squash them faster than you can do a burpee.

IMPROVED: Get the most from your Coach. Finely tune your Coach week in newly designed screens.

IMPROVED: Your Athlete Profile looks better than ever. Expect more great design changes soon.

If you see any bugs, let us know! We'll squash them faster than you can do a burpee.

NEW: A new design in the training session overview in your Coach day helps you train smarter.
We've made changes under the hood to make the user experience the best version possible.
If you see any bugs, let us know! We will squash them faster than you can do a burpee.

NEW: Adjust your height and weight in your profile. Your Coach uses this info to design your Coach weeks, so make sure it's current!

IMPROVED: Now, when you train offline, your training will be archived.

As always, we've fixed some bugs and made changes under the hood. Because change starts from within.

IMPROVED: Freeletics is proudly made in Europe, which means we respect your digital rights. In preparation for the European Union's data protection regulation, we made some privacy settings clearer and easier to use.

We squashed some bugs. Let us know if you find more. Our developers will fix them faster than you can do an Aphrodite.

NEW: You've conquered Aphrodite and Kentauros. Can you conquer Erebos, Achilles, Odysseus and Amazona? Find over 30 new God Workouts now in the app. Discover new favorites, set new PBs.

NEW: Your Freeletics Coach is now smarter and tougher. Discover the digital Coach that will challenge your body to transform. #noexcuses

Found a bug? Let us know.

NEW: Your PBs now appear in the Workout list. It's easier than ever to find the workout you want to conquer next.

Took a break from training? No problem. A new feature allows you to ease back into your training sessions with lighter workouts. If you took more than a month off, you can re-start your Training Journey from day 1. Nothing like a fresh start.

You can now find 5 new warmup & cooldown routines in the Explore tab. Warmups & Cooldowns help prevent injury & optimize your workout performance, so be sure to work them into your sessions.

Some training plans now include fixed-time intervals in which you aim to complete as many reps as possible. Keep an eye on your technique here.

We also now support Apple ID sign-in across our platforms, so you can easily access the training content you need.

We squashed some bugs. Let us know if you find more. Our developers will fix them faster than you can do an Aphrodite.

Took a break from training? No problem. A new feature allows you to ease back into your training sessions with lighter workouts. If you took more than a month off, you can re-start your Training Journey from day 1. Nothing like a fresh start.

You can now find 5 new warmup & cooldown routines in the Explore tab. Warmups & Cooldowns help prevent injury & optimize your workout performance, so be sure to work them into your sessions.

Some training plans now include fixed-time intervals in which you aim to complete as many reps as possible. Keep an eye on your technique here.

We also now support Apple ID sign-in across our platforms, so you can easily access the training content you need.

Big news for Apple Watch owners! You can now train "phoneless." Simply transfer your training session from your phone to your watch and you're free to leave your phone behind. Afterwards, send your session results back to your phone and give your coach feedback.

Also, we squashed a few bugs, like how some of you were unable to contact us directly through the app. Now, you can!

Let us know if you find more. Our developers will fix them faster than you can do an Aphrodite.

Also, we squashed a few bugs, like how some of you were unable to contact us directly through the app. Now, you can!
We squashed some bugs. Let us know if you find more. Our developers will fix them faster than you can do an Aphrodite.

Workout explanations: We've added short explanations of pace and focus to your workout overview screens. These explanations help you perform your workout as specifically intended, so you can get the most out of your effort.

Weight-loss audio course: We've added 5 more audio sessions to the "Sustainable weight-loss" course, currently only available in English. Give it a listen and improve your understanding of sustainable weight-loss.

New guided interval run: Put on your headphones and get interval running with a new guided audio session.

We squashed some bugs, including the mysteriously disappearing post-run map. Let us know if you find more. Our developers will fix them faster than you can do an Aphrodite.

Some big updates coming your way…
NEW EXERCISES! We have added 38 new Warmup & Cooldown exercises to the Coach experience. Check them out.
Always rushing to the next exercise? We've also added a short time window between exercises so you can get into proper position before the countdown timer starts.
Want to locate our most recently added content? We've added a "New" tag in the Explore tab so you can't miss it!
Lastly, if you're coming back from a longer break from training, we've enhanced your re-start experience. Happy training!
We squashed some bugs. Let us know if you find more. Our developers will fix them faster than you can do an Aphrodite.

Got a jump rope, resistance band, or foam roller laying around? Then check out the "Explore" tab for 52 new equipment-based workouts and exercises.

Want to keep track of all your workouts you do in a day? Now, any workouts you complete — whether from the "Explore" tab or from your Training Journey — can be found listed in your "Coach" tab on the respective calendar day.

Furthermore, your Coach will communicate more effectively with you via motivational nudges and training reminders.

And we've squashed some bugs for a smoother training experience.

21 NEW workouts have landed in the Explore tab


- Check out the totally new workout experience on rest days or in addition to your Coach sessions.
- Only have 10, 15, or 20 minutes - to be exact? Check out the new workouts that are time-based rather than rep-based, so you can plan accordingly.
- Want to spend some extra time focusing on a certain body area? New workouts are categorized into lower body, upper body, core, or full body -- so choose what suits you.
- New resistance band & jump rope workouts mean you can train with the equipment you have available at home or outside.
- Feeling a bit tight or want to prevent tightness? Give our new mobility workouts a try. They'll loosen you up while keeping your muscles activated.
